meanings.definition: A person who sees or observes something.
meanings.sent1: The beholder of the beautiful sunset smiled in awe.
meanings.sent2: The beholder of the painting admired the artist's skill.
meanings.sent3: The beholder of the magic trick gasped in surprise.
meanings.sent4: She was the beholder of all the secrets in the town.
meanings.sent5: The beholder of the shooting star made a wish.

meanings.definition: A person who looks at or perceives something.
meanings.sent1: The curious beholder examined the ancient artifact closely.
meanings.sent2: The beholder of the treasure map plotted the course.
meanings.sent3: The beholder of the funny meme burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: He was the beholder of truth in a world of lies.
meanings.sent5: The beholder of the rare flower marveled at its beauty.
